function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High reliance on online education during COVID-19","Impact":"Potential decrease in the use of offline education facilities","Mitigation":"Developing hybrid education models that combine online and offline teaching methods","Technologies":"Virtual learning platforms, remote teaching tools","People":"Students, families, educators","Owner":"Education authorities, schools, technology providers"},{"Description":"Concerns about the quality of online teaching","Impact":"Decreased satisfaction and trust in online education","Mitigation":"Investing in training for educators in online teaching strategies and quality assurance measures","Technologies":"Online learning management systems, virtual classroom tools","People":"Students, families, educators","Owner":"Education authorities, schools, technology providers"},{"Description":"Unprotected working hours of parents due to online education","Impact":"Increased stress and work-life imbalance for parents","Mitigation":"Providing flexible work arrangements and support for parents, promoting digital literacy for parents","Technologies":"Remote work tools, digital communication platforms","People":"Parents, employers, educators","Owner":"Government, employers, schools"}]}
